title: Looking for players for semi-serious team
body:
Looking for players to join a new team. Only serious players need apply. 18+ only, all lanes available at this stage.
Post below with:
Name:
IGN:
Age:
Role:
Rank:
Best Champions:
Back up role:

Thanks.

replies.body:
Name: Daniel
IGN: Gumball
Age: 19
Role: ADC
Rank: Gold 4
Best Champions: Jinx, Vayne, Kalista, Tristana
Back up role: Mid

Aidan
Aidan7787
19
B5 (first year ranked last year, started too early. got stuck)
Top
Champs: Irelia, Fiora, Gnar, Jax, Garen, Matrox
Back Up role: Mid
Will happily play a game w you if wanted. Very positive, don't like forfeiting unless like 30-0 down

Aidan
xDonMegadrivex
27
B4 (unfortunately)
Can honestly play any role
Try me out
